author: david laveque
comment: Well, I for one, think this is a very good app, that's why I bought the pro version. Sometimes, people need to spend more time using apps to understand how it functions best.

comment: Start recording sensetivity level is not sensetiv enough. It dos not remember Dropbox connection will restart. Otherwise work fine.

comment: Very nice to have an app that start recording when it starts.
